Directions: In a large saucepan, bring onions, peppers and broth to a boil. Reduce heat; cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, salsa and seasonings; return to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 12-15 minutes. Add beans and corn; simmer 5 minutes longer or until heated through, stirring occasionally. Garnish each serving with cheese.
Ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) cans diced tomatoes and green chiles
1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, rinsed and drained
